title: Hotel / restaurant industry : percentage of female employees by region 2010
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Female employees for 6 number of Countrys.
The Female employees is appeared to be the highest at Country Latin America and lowest at Country Asia.
The highest Country Latin America has 23.1 more Female employees than the lowest Country Asia.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Female employees in the y axis.
The Female employees is highest at Country Latin America and lowest at Country Asia.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Female employees for 6 number of Countrys.
The Female employees is appeared to be the highest at Country Latin America and lowest at Country Asia.
The highest Country Latin America has 23.1 more Female employees than the lowest Country Asia.
max_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Female employees in each Country on the y axis.
The Female employees is appeared to be the highest at Country Latin America and lowest at Country Asia.
The second highest Female employees is appeared to be the Country Caribbean.
The difference of Female employees between the highest and lowest Country is 23.1.
The Country Latin America has the highest Female employees, followed by Caribbean, and Average. Down to the Country Asia which is the lowest.
The Country Latin America tends to be 1.2 percent higher than average.
